remarks: A more efficient proof of Theorem 5.7 of [Clemente] p. 19.  Compare with ~ ex-natded5.7 .  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2017.)
statement:
ex-natded5.7.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps \/ ( ch /\ th ) ) ) $.
ex-natded5.7-2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ps \/ ch ) ) $.
